attributes.action: captain Tom raised £22m  for NHS should be distributed to all the key workers
attributes.background: Government to make sure front line key workers get this money we are at war with Coronavirus these key workers ie nurses doctors are soldier risking there life to save ours

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Captain Moore's fundraising was for NHS Charities Together and not for the UK Government or Parliament.  It is a decision for the recipient on how the money raised is used.
